text: Robert Van Kerkhoven (1 October 1924 – 18 June 2017) was a Belgian international footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Career== Van Kerkhoven played club football for Daring Club Bruxelles. He earned a total of nine caps for Belgium between 1951 and 1956,Nombre de caps par joueur (tous les matches officiels A), URBSFA-KBVB website and participated at the 1954 FIFA World Cup. Van Kerkhoven died in June 2017 at the age of 92.
